description: Luxurious shawl-collar robe in blush pink

core:description.text: An elegant shawl-collar robe in a delicate blush pink hue. Crafted from sumptuous silk, this luxurious robe features a wide shawl collar that drapes gracefully around the shoulders and a self-tie belt at the waist. The flowing silhouette provides both comfort and sophistication, perfect for lounging in style.
